news.title: Unraveling the legal, economic and market ramifications if Trump tries to fire Fed Chair Powell
news.summary: There are no easy answers. The tempestuous situation poses myriad thorny questions for which there are noeasy answers. It's not clear what the future holds for the White House.

news.title: Trump sues Murdoch for $10 billion over WSJ story on Epstein birthday letter
news.summary: President Trump is under increasing pressure to have the Justice Department release files about the late pedophile Jeffrey Epstein. The Justice Department is expected to release the files this week.

news.title: ‘30% is untenable’: From Irish whiskey to Italian cheese, Trump's tariff threat rattles EU exporters
news.summary: "At that 30% level ... it will be a lose-lose situation," one distillery boss told CNBC. "It's going to be a very, very difficult time for us," he said.

news.title: Block shares soar 10% on entry into S&P 500
news.summary: Block is joining the S&P 500, replacing Hess as of July 23. Block will be the first African-American woman to serve as chairman and CEO of a Fortune 500 company.

news.title: Justice Department asks court to unseal Epstein, Maxwell grand jury transcripts
news.summary: The Trump administration's handling of the so-called Epstein files has spurred a growing backlash from within the president's own MAGA base.

news.title: My daughter has $500K in med-school expenses. Can my wife and I afford to pay it off?
news.summary: “Our annual income is $140,000. We are both on Medicare,” she says. “Our family is very happy.”

news.title: I have early Alzheimer’s and my husband has stage 4 kidney disease. We just inherited $50K. How can this help us?
news.summary: “We have a 401(k) with $20,000, and $29,000 in a Roth IRA,” she says.

news.title: Why cheaper power looks unlikely as Trump’s big budget law reshuffles the U.S. energy landscape
news.summary: The One Big Beautiful Bill Act, signed into law earlier this month, will likely change the nation’s energy landscape. It could lead to higher power costs just as the race to grow artificial intelligence heats up.

news.title: My brother-in-law left $600K to a friend. He experienced oxygen deprivation due to COPD. Can my husband contest the will?
news.summary: “Around 30 days before passing, he changed everything to go to a friend.” “He changed everything. He changed everything,” his mother said.

news.title: 3 reasons why investors have largely ignored Trump’s tariff threats as Aug. 1 deadline approaches
news.summary: Investors countenanced a barrage of tariff threats as the Trump administration ratcheted up the pressure on U.S. trade partners ahead of its Aug. 1 deadline.
